actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Grandparents Day."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Grandparents Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Grandparents Day."
